values: today is good!!!!!! went to church this morning which was ok... first day of senior sunday school. i cant waittill the area bibly studies start they are going to be so awesome. i went to see weakthemighty last night (stephen's band) at the ice house in rockwall. me and joy went. it was fun they were good and he is so cute lol. i love musicians... but anyway i went to northwest after church this morning and got to see josh and ammon. which was nice but jason wasnt there which made me sad. i came home today and was supposed to start my sumer reading due thursday but instead i went to the grocery store and bought the stuff to make my black bean dip and then came home and made it and then stephen stopped by to say hello before he had to go to work. i just wrote one paper of summer reading and i ahve 3 more to go and then i need to annotate paradise lost cuz i am going to be so mad if i dont get an a on this it is not even funny. i need all the help i can get with this ap thing beleive you me. anyway i am going to go work on it some more and then prolly around 6 i am going to go see stephen at starbucks.. he is so cute i have the biggst crush ever. anyway i need go "read" later kids! so heres stephen playing last night... lata kiddies...
im not very happy right now... i need to go sorry i hate posts like these...

love you joshua!!!! i had the best time last night atlking to josh.  he is so great.  i am so proud of him.  anyway i am about to go dominate at some disc golf... probably not actually but it still going to be a rockin good time.  i had to go to the doctor this morning... holy crap i was so scared.  they werer going to take blood but i like totally and absolutely refused.  anyway here is an interesting pic of me getting a kgb or whatever the heck it is called.  the nurse said she has worked there almost 11 years and this is the first time anyone has ever takena  apicture... i am such a loser.... so there you have it folks lol i love that swim suit.  that is all i have for now.  i start school tomorrow and i seriously like dont beleive it.  i am so in denial.  later yall mads

here i go again on my own... goin down the only road ive ever known!!!!!
today was nice.
got up early and went to church then lunch then me and mom went back to school shopping and then joy and i went to buffalo exchange and then to starbucks where jubul gave us free chai tea lattes.  he is so great.  i am tellin you it pays to be friends with me when you want starbucks.  1500 dollars later i am finally getting some benefits...  lol so me, joy and jubul chilled outside talked about travelling and had a cigar.  it was very relaxing.  then i watched pimp my ride when i should have been doing summer reading and now i am writing livejournal when i should be doing summer reading and in a few minutes i am going to watch a movie with my mom when i should be donig summer reading.  i am the biggest procrastinator in the history of the world.  stephen is out of town which is sad... he gets back tuesday but i start school wednesday so... that sucks but i am so ready to graduate.  this is going to be a quick year though.  i got the most bad a backpack today.  it is so cool.  HOLY CRAP I FORGOT TO CALL ALI!!!  dammit.  i suck.  ok well i have to go i really need to read please pray for me!
love
mads

so... i officially do now know what is going on any longer.  i know that i need to spend some seriousl time in prayer and listening to what God is trying to say to me.  i know that this is one of the first real tests i have faced since my experience the other night and i dont want to screw it up.  i know that god's will is perfect and god's time is perfect.  i like him and he knows this and he likes me and i know this.  but there are so many things that seem to complicate things ya know?  i know that all things work for the good of those who love him and i am so excited to see what god has in store for me over these next few days and weeks.  be praying for me if you happen to think of it.  i always appreciate it.  im excited and anxious and nervous and calm all at the same time. which cuold get nauseating lol but thats cool.  later kiddos

sup foos?
today is going to be long lol i woke up at 3.20 and it seems like its been almost an entire day but it is only 10.30 lol that is carazy.  this morning was the most amazing experience of my life.  well second most amazing experience of my life i suppose.  God is so great.  anyway i am going to work in 3 and a half hours... so i dont know what i am going to do until then lol... just sit on my bum and be bored i suppose.  grant left this morning.  i am so sad.  i hope that he has a great year.  i saw a busted fire hydrant today it was really cool i took a picture.  i love my parents so much.  i dont htink that anyone could be as blessed as i am when it comes to parents.  they are so amazing and so understanding and so wise.  i love it.  anyway i still dont know what is going on with stephen and i, but i hope it keeps going.  he is incredble.  speaking of incredible... napoleon dynamite... can you say obsessed?  thats me.  anyway i am going to go waste time until it is time for me to go to work.  lata kids.  
love
madi

i hate myspace i think.  what is up with this font?  it has been using this all day... i like it.  anyway i am about to go see napoleon dynamite... again oh my gosh i am such a freakin freak.  FIVE TIMES.  anyway.  so this new boy... so freakin cute.  i have no idea what the feelings are or anything but... seriously... so cute...  mom says hes too old.  i dont know.  hes an amazing christian. we will just see what happens i guess.  i hope that everyone has been having a fabulous day.  i had my first quiet time in too long today.  it was so nice.  god is so good.  i am so fortunate.  i am so unworthy and god's will is soooo perfect.  i love it its such an adventure.  yall peace out.  smile cuz jesus loves you.
go round the outside round the outside round the outside...

i jsut got home from an extremely interesting morning.  i am supposed to be at church at 8.30... becca called me at 9.10 and woke me up while at austins apartment with no guitar... bummer.  so i got ready in like 2 minutes and grabbed mike's guitar and i had no strap, pick, songs, capo, etc.  and no shoes.  so i ran into church at like 9.25 and it sounded awful and it was totally my fault.  oh well.  anyway i went to starbucks afterward and talked to albert for a long time and i think that we are going to go see napoleon dynamite tomorrow lol which will be so fun i cant wait to see the wedding at the end.  this will be the fifth time i have seen it.    but that is totally cool.  i need to start working out again.  i am getting fat lol.  anyway i think i am going to grant's eagle scout ceremony today.  i hung out with joy yesterday and it was so fun i love her so much...  and then i might be going out to the mound.. we shall see.  ayway i hope yall have a great day.  love you!
mads

ok so austin begged me to post these horribly embarrassing pictures... well only look at this if you feel compelled. SO HERE IS AUSTIN IN HIS BOXERS GETTIN HELLA PISSED OFF AT DANCE DANCE... AS WELL AS THIS ONE: and here is me totally kicking the ass of dance dance and that is my ass yes... ass crack. hell yeah. i so got an a too. i am so sorry.

hey i promised you pictures so here you go!!!!!!!! this is me and bub at guero's taco bar... tacos, bland... sause... effing hot. altogether should not have been voted best mexican in austin. makes you feel patriotic dont it? me and bub went thrift store shopping and loved these sunglasses although we did not buy them. and we immediately regretted this descision... toy joy... the coolest store on planet earth.. for real. rc="http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/madsking/DSCF0029.jpg"> antones music store... not so cool also went to waterloo records which was much cooler than antones.... man it was raining so hard when we left in bumper to bumper traffic at 5:30 pm... good call bub... we stopped at walmart to get out of the rain and to eat fine food at mickey d's. we played guess how many calories... dont play it finally the pretty sunset to end the day... nice... god is so great...

austin was so fun!!!
i was scared to death the whole drive up there it was raining so hard.  i have never prayed so long in my life... but shopping was fun and it didnt rain!!!  austin was being difficult and extremely whiney lol.  hes like, "why didnt i sleep in the car....?"  it was fun though we went to all kinds of places and i am gonig to figure out how to post pics later... anyway the drive back austin was too tired to drive so he sat on his ass and played gameboy the whole time and wouldnt let me listen to my music... but thats ok.  we listened to a horribly innapropriate comedian...  and after 3 hours we get to the fork in 35... dun dun dun... i took 35 w, and knew immediately that it was wrong but austin told me to stay on cuz it all goes to the same place... but wait... no it doesnt!!!!! so we got to 30 and i was like,"maybe we should take 30" and austin was like,"no dont take 30 stay on this it hits lbj."  again... no it doesnt so we were like 20 miles from dento when i turned around and took 820 to 183 to irving to nw highway and finally to 75... damn.  i am a highway conuisseur ill tell you that much.  i have to go for now i will post pics later bye bye!
I DONT WANT IT TO RAIN TOMORROW!!!!!!!!

i realized yesterday that i never answer my phone... like ever.  and then when i see who i ve missed i think, "ill call them in a bit" and then i forget.  i am so lazy its ridiculous.  i got in trouble yesterday because i use too much gas and i spend almost 1000 dollars a year at starbucks.... its crazy i know.  so i have decided that i can only go there 3 times a week.  i am going to go crazy though.  like absolutely crazy.   i bet it doesnt last... not at all.  if i go 3 times a week that is 11.41 a week if i dont tip.  (my grande iced non fat caramel macchiato is 3.73)  im depressed.  i am going to austin tomorrow.  with my bro which could be fun.  for me anyway i dont imagine that austin will have much fun at all but maybe we can go to a show or something... who knows.  anyway for the rest of today i am supposed to chill with mom who faked...(fook?) sick today so she can get her hair done.  i have SO DONE THAT before.  lol but we are going to go to west villaige which will be the third day in a row for me.  hooray for consistency.  lata cracka foos.

i have found that alot of times being extremely friendly to people at places like starbucks, or jamba juice, can often result in cheap, or even free stuff.  and i think sex is the same way today too.  sad but true.  virginity is the most sacred thing that we can choose what we want to do with.  we can keep it until marraige, or give it to someone who we wont care anything about in 2 years.  its such a waste of such a beautiful thing.  anyway side note.

ok i caved and decided to leave a not so sad short "im depressed" post.... outline of last nights chomsky/old 97's show is as follows

8:15- pick up paige
8:30- begin waiting for doors to open (which were supposed to open at 8)
9:00- doors open
10:15- chomsky goes on (freakin absolutely wonderful)
11:00- pushy annoying couple stands directly in front of me
11:01 guy puts on GOGGLES.
11:01-11:45- couple sticks tongues into each others mouths (and every time they do this it blocks my view of the old 97's which went on at...)
11:15- and they sucked
11:50- me and paige leave after buying chomsky cd...

HOORAY FOR CHOMSKY

today i got amelie which is an amzing and watched more family guy... then me and becca went and vented to each other about lotsa crap for like and hour and a half.  it felt good.  and then i went into the car and searched for bleeder by alkaline trio so i could yell the f-word but i couldnt find it so i had to listen to the hotwatemusic cover in the stead.  i want my cd back... night all i am kinda sad tonight.
but i still love you and i cant wait for austin to get back tomorrow 
the end

today was like a solid 5 lol.  went to bed at 2 in the morning after seeing bourne supremacy with ryan, morgan, clay, etc, then woke up at 1130 and went to have lunch with ryan which was gross but still fun.  then i had to work and it was freakin insane today i had to stamp and highlight effing 300 pairs of effing jeans that are going on sale on monday... then all of the people i was going to see tonight went to parties instead.  so its just me and family guy.im probably going to hit the sack soon.  ive got a long day tomorrow and then old 97s tomorrow night which will be soooo much fun but im sad that im missing a different show lol cant win em all i guess... i miss my old friends.

i am sittin here at the godbey lecture series about to go spend a beautiful day at the kimbell art museum with my mom and baout 20 old.... old.... old ladies.  it should be... well interesting at least.  i saw the terminal last night.  not bad but i was disappointed.  like phone booth only not quite so exciting.  and that is pretty sad.  i have to go now i love you guys, and kali lets get lunch or dinner if you have to work like.... somtime this weekend.  just call me i cant thursday but we should totally figure something out.  josh i hope your ear gets better later yall

last night was soooo fun.  it was so nice to kinda get away from everything.  man... veggie burgers, napoleaon dynamite, cd world, starbucks for two hours, kill bill, and top it off with talking for another hour lol.  so fun. i went to nw this morning cuz josh watned me to go and i have never felt more uncomfortable or more unwelcome in my entire life.  like i had to leave early it was bothering me so much.  the singing was awesome though and i totally enjoyed it.  i think that i am about to head out to mesquite to hang out with cory coons before he leaves me for 2 weeks lol so sad.  but he is playing volleyball at the moment so i think i will wait a few minutes.  i have been feeling so much happier these past few days.  i know that joy never leaves, that it can just be kind of supressed but i can finally feel... well anything again.  it is so nice.  i feel so happy and excited.  i love my family i hope that austin is having fun in new york i am so proud of him.  love you bub.  later yall

i just played the funiiest pop up ad ever lol.  i am about to go see napoleon dynamite for the FOURTH time lol it is soooo good and i am seeing it again on thrusday i know it is ridiculously pathetic.  love you guys have a great evening ALI I MISS YOU

I AM FEELING SO GOOD TODAY.  activities wise it kinda sucked.  billy you were awesome but just ask me to play drums if you need me too geez no need to be bashful lol.  anyway austin... i am so proud of you and i am going to miss you this week.  god is going to do amazing things in you.  i am feeling so good. i ahve two dates this week. lol well kinda i guess. one is with michael hammontree lol it is going to be sooooo fun i cant wait.  i am belting the elephant love medley... i love moulin rouge so much.  so great.  i am so glad that me and aubrey and me and luisa are hanging out!  i love them so much!  yall have a fabulous day i am having so much fun i feel like my self again besides the awful pain in my neck that i think is springing from a bad ear infection.  pray for me if you think of it.  thanks!
have a great day if you want to

i jsut hung out with josh and it was so much fun.  i miss all my friends so much...lately i have been completely void of like any emotion.  like tonight talking to josh i started getting choked up and it aws almost a great feeling just to feel something.  i am so drained and i get sad thinking that my personality and my view of life in general is so much more... negative and tainted than it used to be.  i remember when i was happy, but im not not happy... i just feel like ive let the world get the best of me and get me down.  i need god so bad right now but i dont even have the energy or faith to reach out to him.  i love all of you so much: josh, ammon, ali (especially), billy, frank, brent, charley, peter, jonathan, kris, christa, kali... you all know who you are.  but its like i know that all there is left of some of these relationships is missing them.  and thats ok i guess.  its better than nothing.  sometimes its better than something maybe.  i wish i could back to being myself.  i wish that everything could get back to the way it was 6 months ago.  i know that alot of my posts are negative but i feel like its because i still see things that are bad that most people dont see.  maybe they are just more obvious to me because i am more sensitive to them.  i dont know lol i dont make any sense.  
ps- josh i was thouroughly impressed with your manliness getting your rook pierced tonight.  take care of it and i hope it feels better.  later kiddies

i have been having this horrible fear lately.  i am so afraid that i am not going to do what i want to do in life.  i am beginning to get all these realistic ambitions and expectations that are so not me.  i dont think that i want to like settle and get some pracical degree that i can use to make a mediocre amount of money and that will make me cultured and respectable... there are so many things that i want to do.  i think that got scared when it came to my music because i didnt want to go to college and study guitar... but i love singing.  i love it.  i am so passionate about it and i feel that i have at least some kind of talkent for it.  i want to be a rockstar... and a pirate... and a stunt driver... and own a crazy coffeeshop... i am just so scared that one day i am going to look back and wish that i had done something different.  and another thing. i am not gogin to waste oppurtuniteis any more.  i am so concerned with making sure that other people arent offended by my actinos... (spanish for actions) that it makes me sick.  i am not going to sit around and wait for people to get over whatever the hell they are bitching about to make myself happy.  maybe me freaking stepping on some toes will help them (and just so you know if you are reading this there is like a 99 percent chance that you have nothing to do wih this) to get over their stupid problems... that are no longer my problems... DAMN!!! ok sorry anyway i need to make some adjustments and stop being so realisic.  night folks yall have a happy ending.
ps-im no longer someone else's girl

i think its funny to see how we change certain situations in our minds to make ourselves feel better about them... humans are so pathetic lol.  anyway that is fairly pessimistic i am going to go eat some veggies... lol later kiddies
mads

its amazing how uncontrollable feelings are.  no matter how set you are on feeling one way or not feeling one way... it just doenst really matter.  almost like something inside you begins to feel sonething you dont want to be feeling just to spite you... i cant be thinking these things or wanting the things that i want right now withour pissing off or hurting so many people.  but i cant help it. i will jsut have to see what is happening.  i know this is incredibly vague... but it has to be.  anyway i hope yall have a fabulous day love you bunches..
mads

boredom... taking over me... want... to... sleep... 
and we dont freakin close for another hour lol.  i cant wait till tonight.  me frank and ali are going to deep ellum.  maybe a few others not sure.  i want to see napolean dynomite again really bad as well.  if you havent seen it... see it it is the funniest thing like ever.  anyway i want to be 18 so i can get my tattoos soooo freakin bad.  that would be so awesome.  my lil music staff and me.  anyway my drum set is completely awesome.  lol kali, i am becoming more and more like you every day.  i suck at typing.  anyway i hope everyone is doing fabulously cant wait till tonight.  i hope that josh and jason and jake come.  i have alot of friends whose name starts with j.  josh, josh, jason, jay, jake, jessica, etcetera etcetera etcetera.. lol i just saw the king and i sorry... and... adios... amigos  bitch

hola amigos.  i am about to head over to my great aunts house for fourth o' july food.  happpy fourth everyone.  independence.... ahhh gotta love it.  anyway... i have completed like 5 days of being vegetarian.  http://www.goveg.com   go there... watch the meet your meat video and you will too.  the most disgusting inhumane thing i have ever seen.  nothing but fish for me.  anyway i have had a great past few days.  i have been thinking so much about everything lately.  how much feelings wear off.  feelings are so temporary and stuff that has been happening lately has just proved that.  i know more and more that not everythign is so nostalgic.  descisions and commitments take conscious thought and effort.  an always ongoing process.  and this has been in so many areas of my life right now.  austin is gone for good.  i miss him already but i wish that he would get all his unwatned crap outta my living room lol.  anyway i have to go its time for fourth of july barbequed.... corn i guess.  lol later kiddies.

HOLY SHIT I AM SO PISSED i jsut deleted my entire entyry and i know i am not going to be able to remmeber it.  ok lets see... im sorry to everyone who has had to experience my bitchiness over the past several days.  i ove all of you. i had so much fun with kali at the omg show the other night and WHITE TELEPHONE is an amazing band. they were so good.  i am starting to decorate my new living room tahti s austins room.  he is moving out today and i am sad but i am still excit3d about my living room.  i have been practising my drums all the time.  i am awesome.  anyway i got to see pete last night for a bit at the perfect ending show and that was cool.  and the show was great.  i love brent, frank, and jake.  they are awesome.  anyway got to meet some new people which was also great fun.  i had so much fun with ali last night i have missed her so much.   it was great catching up and she hasnt smoked in a week i am so proud of her.  anyway i hope yall are doing fabulously.  graham and patty are supposed to come to d-town today and im sure we will have a blast.  i g2g kiddies tlak touall later.
luv mads
ps- ammon we need to hang out someime.  luv ya

i cant stop thinking about the subject of respect and judgement.  i dont know why everyone assumes that we arent supposed to judge people.  no you are not supposed to "judge" them meaning condemn them or think that you are better than them.  but you are supposed to judge them based on character, and habits.  you ahve to decide based on those judgements who you decide to hang around with or what to do.  also... everyone today seems to think that they deserve respect.  respect is not an unalienable right, it is a privelage, it is earned, it is deserved.  i am not called to respect my peers.  (not saying that i dont, but i am not called to.)  i am called to love them.  thats it.  just been on my mind.  peace yall 
mads

boo!!!!!!!
i got off work early... i am so super mondo excited.  i think i am supposed to go to peter's tonight for hamburgers... but i dont know...?  but i think so...?  anyway.  i went to starbucks this morning as usual.  i just love those guys they are so nice.  and i got PURPLE PAPER DENIM AND CLOTHS for only 27 bucks.  now that is the best deal of the century.  i love my jeans.  anyway i really have nothing else to say i am supposed to get my hair done on wednesday and then take ali to get her nipples pierced and THEN i might be going to see aerosmith... we will just have to see.  if i dont see them then i am going to SOLID ROCK which should be just as much fun... right?

i am really hoping that this is one of those really short lj posts that for some crazy reason gets like 18 comments.  that always amazes me.  i went to see rocky votolato last night and it was so good.  and he is really nice.  there were only like 15 people at the show but it was still sooo good.  and then we got lost on the way home thus making us late and now i am grounded.  bummer.  oh well for somereason my mom always always always wakes me up to say bye onsunday and tell me things that just "absolutely cannot wait" but she leaves like an hour and a half before i do and she knows good and well that i cannot go back to sleep.  its so irritating...

why hello... 
geesh... i just went to see ben's band forever hopeful.  they actually did pretty good i was impressed.  i dont know what i am going to do tonight.  ammon was supposed to call me... so was josh... so was ali actually lol.  oh well im just gonna chill here i guess.  i never know what is going on anymore.   i miss paige... no one is ever happy anymore.. i just want someone who is happy/  lol anyway austin ditched me this weekend too.  he was supposed to take me to lubbock. i am in a suprisingly good mood tonight.  i love the rain so much.  its so pretty and peaceful.  i have decided that i dont think that i ever want to dress up again.  i am so comfy in tee shirts and boy's shorts and baseball caps and i think that that is what i am going to wear forever.  even though i will probably look like a lesbian, but thats ok cuz im not... well maybe its not ok but i really dont care.  anywho have you ever thought about how horrible the stereotype for a pirate is?  they by far have the worst stereotype of anyone...  i mean how would you feel if everyone thought you had one eye, a wooden leg, a hook for a hand, and wore nothing but capri pants with horrid looking red and white striped shirts... and they are never clean shaven and they cant talk correctly... poor pirates.  i just think it is sad... i really want to see against me! live... they are so amazing.  if you have never heard of them hear of them and go by "the eternal cowboy."  so so good.  anyway i dont have much else to say so yall have a fabulous day and think next time you think about a pirate... they hav feelings too ok?  geesh...
i feel better today.  i hav been having pizza and watching family guy.  its nice to get away.  i love you guys...

its not the answer.... im telling you.  i know that i may be "unexperienced" and that people think that im "naive" but seriously... there is a difference between not knowing and choosing not to.  if i was the one that didnt have a clue then wouldnt i be looking for the answers in the bottom of a bottle or throwing my life away at parties getting drunk...?  or hooking up with random people...?  or not remembering where i came from and who i am... a child of God.  fulfillment comes from Him and His promises only.  i know that the depression and betrayel that i am feeling right now will be comforted knowing that despite how many friends i grow apart from i am making the right desiscion...  and all i can do is be a good and loyal friend and be there in the face of people who i feel have betrayed me, and back stabbed me, and lied to me, and hurt me... deeply.  i love yall.

i feel like alot of my relationships are deteriorating... some not because i dont want them to be there- but because of lack of trust, or lack of effort.  im not looking for like consolation or anything but just to send this out into the void... why do people always, almost inevitably, grow apart?  have you ever looked at a best friend and thought you saw something going on that you have no idea about?  or get the feeling that your best friend isnt being honest with you at all about hs/her habits?  i hate being lied to and i hate trying to mend over and over relationships that seem sometimes like they are built on nothing.  so anyway, goodbye, dear void... you never could answer my questions.  september is coming soon which means a huge chunk of me will be heading off to different parts of texas to go to different schools... which means that it could be months or even a year before we are all together again.  i worry about the well being for some of them.  i pray for them constantly... i just dont want to see these people, these amazing people who i have been lucky to know and befriend, waste their amazing god-given potential on a few nights of partying and drinking... the sacrifice will ALWAYS be worth it in the end.  and all i can do is promise that.

i havent had an updidation in a while.  well here it is.. mother's day.  i got momio some flowers and a card that the dog stepped on sooo.... a strategically placed wirnkled card i guess.  i love my mom she is the absolute best mom in the entire world.  she means everything to me.  i went to the farm with peter and mr. mc. this weekend.  we had so much fun we went fishing and rowing and then we watched anti trust and i got to country drive which is so nice.  it was a good time.  i did find out however that blondie will be playing in addison the 15th.. the day i leave for senior trip... talk about let down of the century.  so paige if you raed this you have to go see debbie harry on my behalf and tell me how cool she is... man i am so disappointed about that but thats ok.  anyway i am running out of things to say i want my parents to get home from fredericksburg so we can go eat.  later kiddies.

im sittin here in the computer lab again... every time im here i get this wierd feeling of euphoria... like im always here but always doing the same thing but different every time... oh well i was thinkin the other day about who i would like to look like and of course the first time i was thinkin britne spears but.... seriously debbie harry... shes like my idol... blondie is the bomb diggity fo shiggity.  anyhow i just wanted to post my extremely high oppinion of debbie harry and.. thats it really sorry for this extremely disappointing post.

i am in the wierdest mood ever... i would describe it as r.e.m. meets like angry bright eyes (pick a song with the f word in it...) and i just dont think that those two moods should ever cross... they are completely seperate in nature.. it just doesnt make sense... but right now, alot of things dont make sense.  i am confused and unsure of what i am supposed to be feeling at the moment... pain, sadness, hurt, guilt...?  i just am not sure.  ive alwas wondered what the phrase,"every cloud has a silver lining," meant.  i think that in it the clouds are supposed to be negative and the silver lining resemebles the good that always comes after.  well i hate silver.  and i like clouds.  but just so i wont confuse anyone i am going to change this lil saying to, "every cloud has a black lining."  because it seems like whenever something good happens, something bad or dampening inevitably happens.  i am definately in one of my moods.  do you ever get that feeling that that little spark of hope is not even close enough to light up such a dark world?  (thank you thomas hardy...and if you do get that then you are as big an english nerd as i am.)  anyway... back to the cloud thing to make it applicable to me i am going to say that these clouds are gross and polluted and dark and stringy, and that they are lined in bright neon yellow.  i need some neon yellow... i miss austin. and where the hell is a grande non fat iced caramel macchiato when you NEED one?  and no, drive through starbucks, you arent good enough either, just like the rest of us.
